description.value: When Comrade is not in Cohesion or within 10 metres of another player character and engaged in melee with an enemy, Character becomes Frenzied, gaining +10 Strength and +10 Toughness until Comrade is safe or dead. If dead, Character becomes Inconsolable for hours.
